Any word as to whether the PC version will be rlsed too, or will it be a zeroday?

This game has been on heavy lock down.   They wouldn't even let the story leak let alone the game itself.  Even Microsoft titles like Halo and GOW leaked a month before release.  

Rightfully so,  IGN already gave this game a 9.4 and it could be a big contender for Game of the Year.

So with that I would say the 360 ISO version will be posted sometime tomorrow and we won't see a PC version until release day, if not days after release.

Might I suggest actually buying the PC version?  I usually grab the 360 version to test it out and if I like it I buy the legit PC version.  Ken Levine put his heart & soul into this game and he deserves the money.  Support the developers if you want to see more games like this!!
